de.fzi.replica.comm
Interface Connection

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectionImpl
public interface Connection

Represents a connection to a peer. A connection needs to be configured prior to establishing a connection. Every connection has a Connection.ConnectionContext associated to it which provides access to all relevant components and the connection configuration. Connection is the main interface to provide all relevant ECF components which are currently:

  • SharedObject API
  • Datashare API
Moreover it provides access to components which sit upon the ECF modules which are currently:
  • SignalChannelManager
A Connection has a context represented by a Connection.ConnectionContext. All details relevant to a connection are accessible through this interface.

Version:
0.2, 19.07.2011
Author:
Jan Novacek novacek@fzi.de
See Also:
Connection.ConnectionContext
